name: Cirque de Neige
description:
While on a mountain hike, the sudden onset of a fierce blizzard separated you from your hiking group. Lost, alone, and freezing fast, you make a campfire to stay warm until they can come find you in the morning. To keep the fire alive, you must venture out into your surroundings to locate fuel and other supplies. When you do, you notice something moving towards you, silhouetted against the dark night sky...

To win, keep yourself alive for 15 minutes.

[Project is a WIP]
